quote_last:
the air went silent, then a new voice took over the microphone. The voice said: “A message for the ones who hunted blue sheep.”
“That’s us!” Rick gasped.
title: The Wailing Octopus
author: John Blaine

quote_first:
“We will make record of it, my Rosannah; every year, as this dear hour chimes from the clock, we will celebrate it with thanksgivings, all the years of our life.”
“We will, we will, Alonzo!”
“
title: The Loves of Alonzo Fitz Clarence and Rosannah Ethelton
author: Mark Twain
